gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 117, Kings 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Kings, 117-112. Zion Williamson led the way with 25 points, 6 assists, and 5 rebounds for the Pelicans, with Brandon Ingram adding 21 points, 4 rebounds, and 3 assists in the victory. De’Aaron Fox tallied 26 points and 5 assists for the Kings in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 8-7 in the regular season, while the Kings fall to 8-6.
